txt.en: 'Have you seen the Silver Deep? I have only been away for a few days, but already I miss it.'
'Curse the goblins! There is good stone to be mined in the south, but they make it impossible!'
'I have heard that not all forges are of the same quality, just as not all stones are precious.'
'Lost a few friends to the mountains, I did. You don't want to anger the mine.'
